reviews.author: Sarah M.
reviews.text: Fantastische Waffeln und Cappuccino! A small coffee kiosk on the bank of the canal with a relaxing view that is perfect on a sunny afternoon. The staff is always friendly and ready to help.

reviews.author: Thomas K.
reviews.text: Great place to stop for a coffee and perhaps a waffle while taking a stroll along the Landwehrkanal. The canal-side location makes it special, and the sandwiches are really good!

reviews.author: Emma L.
reviews.text: The chef cooks nicely made waffles and croissants. Great service and a cozy atmosphere. Medium prices are fair for the location and quality. Perfect spot for breakfast or afternoon coffee.

reviews.author: Marcus B.
reviews.text: One of the best spots in Kreuzberg for coffee! The terrace by the canal is beautiful in summer. They have a huge selection of teas and the Mediterranean-influenced snacks are delicious.
